title: Climate Change Music-Film-Art Project (MELT) Fund
description: To provide support for filming in Greenland, musicians, and post-production of MELT, a meditation on the meanings and memories of ice in an era of climate change.  A project currently under Assistant Professor Betsy Biggs.
marketingContent: To provide support for filming in Greenland, musicians and post-production of MELT, a meditation on the meanings and memories of ice in an era of climate change. The project is currently under Assistant Professor Betsy Biggs.
